title: The BigXThaPlug Interview: Texas Upbringing, Kicked Out of Multiple Colleges, Trapping & More
description:
BigXThaPlug talks about his tumultuous life, ups, downs, victories, redemptions, his music career and more!

-----
00:00 Intro
1:46 Mom was doing her thing, dad in and out of jail
2:30 From 10 to 16 years old, Big X was full on playing football
3:40 Pops moved to Commerce after coming home from jail, his mom just literally dumped him to his Dad's
6:44 He was feeling himself, dad kicked him out at 16, didn't want to listen to anybody
7:53 After being kicked out of the football team, no one wanted him, moved to Texas with his mom
8:30 Found a team in Texas, got kicked out again, got suspended for his safety
12:24 Went to college in Minnesota for a semester
13:11 Depressed in Minnesota, started puffin' heavy and became the plug
16:13 Went on the run after an incident, didn't know he was on the run, Adam understand why the cops didn't believe BigX explanation
18:13 Do they have any proofs that he p*nched someone? They probably would've locked him up just for being black
18:53 Faced with aggravated robbery when he tried to get his license
26:30 BigX used to rob people, set up dates with girls from back page then robbed them
29:05 Got caught because of his neighbor so BigX took care of it
30:39 Was in solitary for a separated incident
33:45 Started writing in jail to kinda not lose his mind
34:59 Got evicted, lost everything, his friend got sh_t during a deal, got arrested at the hospital
40:45 Wanted to have structure to do his best, A&R went to him, so BigX felt like they were hands on
44:48 Doesn't care to be a rapper specifically, will always go where the biggest bag is
52:39 Long live MO3
53:38 BigX says Charleston White is a civilian
54:00 You always gotta move a certain wherever you go + Do you think PNB should have left his ice in the car?


-----
